name: Bodyweight Squat
step_by_step: Squat down under control and stand back up

name: Split Squat
step_by_step: Rear foot stays back as athlete lowers into split squat

name: Reverse Lunge
step_by_step: Step backward into lunge then return to start

name: Lateral Lunge
step_by_step: Step laterally into deep lunge then return

name: Glute Bridge
step_by_step: Lift hips by squeezing glutes

name: Single-Leg Glute Bridge
step_by_step: Perform glute bridge on one leg

name: Push-Up
step_by_step: Lower chest to floor and push back up

name: Incline Push-Up
step_by_step: Push-up with hands elevated

name: Inverted Row
step_by_step: Pull chest toward bar with body straight

name: Bear Crawl Hold
step_by_step: Hold bear crawl position with knees hovering

name: Dead Bug
step_by_step: Alternate opposite arm and leg while keeping back flat

name: Side Plank
step_by_step: Hold side plank position

name: Skater Jump
step_by_step: Lateral jump from one leg to the other

name: Squat Jump
step_by_step: Squat down and jump vertically

name: Single-Leg Wall Sit
step_by_step: Hold single-leg wall sit position
coaching_cues: Even weight through foot, knee tracks forward

name: Cossack Squat
step_by_step: Squat to one side while opposite leg stays extended

name: Copenhagen Plank
step_by_step: Side plank with top leg supported on bench
coaching_cues: Drive top leg down, hips stacked

name: Broad Jump
step_by_step: Jump forward explosively and stick landing

name: Split-Squat Jump
step_by_step: Jump explosively from split squat stance
coaching_cues: Control landing, switch legs if programmed

name: Forward Lunge Hard Stop
step_by_step: Step forward into lunge and aggressively stop
coaching_cues: Brake with front leg, stable torso

name: Barbell Back Squat
step_by_step: Descend under control, drive up through midfoot

name: Front Squat
step_by_step: Squat with bar in front rack position

name: Goblet Squat
step_by_step: Hold weight at chest and squat

name: Trap Bar Deadlift
step_by_step: Push through floor to stand tall

name: Romanian Deadlift
step_by_step: Hinge at hips keeping slight knee bend

name: Hip Thrust
step_by_step: Drive hips upward squeezing glutes

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
step_by_step: Rear foot elevated, lower into split squat

name: Slider/TRX Rear-Foot Split Squat
step_by_step: Back foot placed on slider or suspended in TRX, lower into split squat and return
coaching_cues: Front leg drives, hips stay square

name: Walking Dumbbell Lunge
step_by_step: Step forward into lunge and continue walking

name: Lateral Dumbbell Lunge
step_by_step: Sit into lateral hip then return

name: Step-Up
step_by_step: Step onto box and drive through lead leg

name: Barbell Bench Press
step_by_step: Lower bar to chest and press upward

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
step_by_step: Press dumbbells with neutral control

name: Push Press
step_by_step: Dip slightly then drive bar overhead

name: Medicine Ball Chest Pass
step_by_step: Explosive chest pass into wall

name: Pull-Up
step_by_step: Pull chin over bar under control

name: Lat Pulldown
step_by_step: Pull bar down to chest

name: Barbell Row
step_by_step: Hinge and pull bar to torso

name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Row
step_by_step: Pull dumbbell toward hip

name: Pallof Press
step_by_step: Press handle away resisting rotation

name: Weighted Dead Bug
step_by_step: Hold weight while alternating limbs

name: Cable Chop
step_by_step: Rotate torso pulling cable diagonally

name: Cable Lift
step_by_step: Drive cable upward across body

name: Farmer Carry
step_by_step: Walk holding heavy weight tall posture

name: Suitcase Carry
step_by_step: Carry weight on one side only

name: Medicine Ball Rotational Throw
step_by_step: Rotate and throw ball explosively

name: Box Jump
step_by_step: Jump onto box and step down

name: Trap Bar Jump
step_by_step: Jump with light load for power

name: Landmine Press
step_by_step: Press bar at angle upward

name: Landmine Row
step_by_step: Pull bar toward hip

name: Single-Leg Romanian Deadlift
step_by_step: Hinge on one leg lowering weight

name: Rear-Foot Elevated Hip Thrust
step_by_step: Single-leg hip thrust

name: Hanging Knee Raise
step_by_step: Raise knees under control

name: Overhead Medicine Ball Slam
step_by_step: Drive ball overhead then slam down

name: Single-Leg Box Squat
step_by_step: Sit back onto box on one leg, control descent, stand back up
coaching_cues: Knee tracks, slow down fast up

name: 3-Way Bench Abs
step_by_step: Hang legs off bench, perform vertical tuck, then repeat tucks to right and left

name: Lateral Dumbbell Raise
step_by_step: Raise dumbbells out to sides to shoulder height

name: Front Dumbbell Raise
step_by_step: Raise dumbbells forward to shoulder height

name: Medicine Ball Wall Squat Throw
step_by_step: Squat near wall holding med ball, drive upward and throw ball vertically against wall

name: Stability Ball Heel Tucks
step_by_step: Lie supine with heels on ball, pull heels toward hips and extend

name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Snatch
step_by_step: Explosively pull dumbbell from floor to overhead in one motion

name: Max Vertical Jump
step_by_step: Perform maximal vertical jump attempts with full recovery between reps
coaching_cues: Full arm swing, violent extension, stick landing

name: Face Pull
step_by_step: Pull rope toward face with elbows high
coaching_cues: Squeeze shoulder blades, rotate hands outward

name: Band Pull-Apart
step_by_step: Pull band apart keeping arms straight

name: Band External Rotation
step_by_step: Rotate forearm outward keeping elbow tucked

name: 90/90 External Rotation
step_by_step: Rotate arm externally at 90-degree shoulder position

name: Scap Push-Up
step_by_step: Push through shoulders at top of plank

name: Wall Slide
step_by_step: Slide arms up wall maintaining contact

name: Y-T-W Raise
step_by_step: Raise arms in Y, T, and W patterns

name: Trap-3 Raise
step_by_step: Raise arm overhead in scapular plane

name: Incline Dumbbell Bench Press
step_by_step: Press dumbbells on an incline bench with control

name: Close-Grip Bench Press
step_by_step: Lower bar to lower chest with close grip and press up

name: Seated Dumbbell Overhead Press
step_by_step: Press dumbbells overhead from seated position

name: Chest-Supported Dumbbell Row
step_by_step: Row dumbbells while chest is supported on incline bench
coaching_cues: Pull elbows to hips, squeeze upper back

name: Seated Cable Row
step_by_step: Pull handle to torso and control back forward

name: Single-Arm Cable Lat Pulldown
step_by_step: Pull handle down toward ribcage one arm at a time

name: Chin-Up
step_by_step: Pull chin over bar using underhand grip

name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Floor Press
step_by_step: Press dumbbell from floor with controlled tempo
coaching_cues: Pause on triceps, keep wrist stacked

name: Cable Triceps Pressdown
step_by_step: Press cable handle down until elbows extend

name: Dumbbell Hammer Curl
step_by_step: Curl dumbbells with neutral grip

name: Diamond Push-Up
step_by_step: Push-up with hands close together under chest

name: Pike Push-Up
step_by_step: Push-up in pike position targeting shoulders
coaching_cues: Head moves toward floor, control tempo

name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Bench Press
step_by_step: Press dumbbell with one arm while stabilizing torso

name: Half-Kneeling Landmine Press
step_by_step: Press bar upward from half-kneeling stance

name: Medicine Ball Scoop Throw
step_by_step: Scoop ball from hip and throw explosively

name: Renegade Row
step_by_step: Row dumbbell from plank position while stabilizing torso

name: Uneven BOSU Dumbbell Squat
step_by_step: Stand on BOSU holding uneven dumbbells and squat under control

name: Skater Curtsey Lunge
step_by_step: Lunge back into curtsey and drive through front leg

name: Alternating Med Ball Slams
step_by_step: Slam med ball outside shoulder width alternating sides

name: Walking Med Ball Slam Lunges
step_by_step: Lunge forward and slam ball each step

name: Dumbbell Front Circles
step_by_step: Circle dumbbells from palms up to palms down

name: Battle Ropes
step_by_step: Alternate waves aggressively up and down

name: Hang Clean to Staggered Catch
step_by_step: Clean from hang into staggered catch

name: Hex Bar Hold to Explode
step_by_step: Half squat hold then explode upward

name: Hang Snatch
step_by_step: Snatch from hang position overhead

name: Barbell Reverse Lunge to Box Step
step_by_step: Reverse lunge then drive onto box

name: Barbell Squat Jumps
step_by_step: Quarter squat into explosive jump

name: Single Arm Dumbbell Snatch
step_by_step: Explode dumbbell from shoulder to overhead

name: Barbell Wrist Curl Behind Back
step_by_step: Hold barbell behind back and curl wrists

name: Seated Dumbbell Wrist Curl
step_by_step: Forearm on thigh, curl wrist upward

name: Rear-Foot Elevated Split Squat (Heavy)
step_by_step: Rear foot elevated, descend under control, drive up hard
coaching_cues: Front leg does the work, slight forward torso

name: Loaded Cossack Squat
step_by_step: Squat to one side holding load, other leg stays long
coaching_cues: Sit into hip, keep chest tall

name: Copenhagen Plank (Loaded)
equipment: Plate or DB on hip + bench
step_by_step: Side plank with top leg supported; add load on top hip
coaching_cues: Hips stacked, drive top leg down

name: Heavy Sled Push
step_by_step: Drive sled with forward lean and powerful steps
coaching_cues: Short powerful steps, keep hips under you

name: Offset Front Rack Carry
step_by_step: Carry one weight in front rack position while other side unloaded
coaching_cues: Ribs down, no leaning, crush handle

name: Split-Stance Anti-Rotation Cable Press
step_by_step: Press cable forward from athletic split stance resisting rotation

name: Tall-Kneeling Anti-Extension Cable Hold
step_by_step: Kneel tall holding cable resisting forward pull
coaching_cues: Glutes tight, ribs down, no arching

name: Tempo Chest-Supported Row
step_by_step: Row dumbbells with 3-second controlled lowering phase

name: Half-Kneeling Anti-Rotation Hold
step_by_step: Hold cable handle at chest height resisting rotation
coaching_cues: Hips square, brace hard, no movement

name: Split-Stance Cable Rotation (Tempo)
step_by_step: Rotate cable across body with 2-sec rotate and 2-sec return

name: Anti-Rotation to Rotation Press
step_by_step: Press cable forward resisting rotation then rotate under control

name: Bottoms-Up Kettlebell Press
step_by_step: Press kettlebell upside down from rack position
coaching_cues: Grip tight, elbow under bell, no wobble

name: Banded Skater Strides
step_by_step: Attach band around waist and perform lateral skating strides; optional stickhandling during movement
coaching_cues: Drive laterally, full extension, maintain athletic posture

name: Box Step-Up with High Knee
step_by_step: Step onto box and explosively drive opposite knee upward
coaching_cues: Explode off lead leg, control landing

name: BOSU Banded Stride Work
step_by_step: Stand on BOSU with band resistance and perform controlled stride outward

name: BOSU Open Hip Rotation
step_by_step: Stand on BOSU, lift leg and open hip 90 degrees, rotate back under control

name: Plyometric Bunny Jumps
step_by_step: Perform repeated two-footed plyometric jumps over hurdles
coaching_cues: Quick ground contact, minimal knee bend

name: Lateral Skater to Single-Leg Vertical Jump
step_by_step: Perform lateral skater bound then immediately explode into vertical jump off landing leg
coaching_cues: Stick lateral landing then explode up, minimal pause

name: Single-Leg Box Jump (Soft Landing)
step_by_step: Jump onto box off one leg and land softly

name: Lateral Two-Foot Jump to Box
step_by_step: Jump laterally off two feet then immediately jump onto box

name: Broad Jump to Box Jump
step_by_step: Perform broad jump then immediately jump onto box

name: Box Drop to Rebound Box Jump
step_by_step: Start standing on box, drop down and rebound explosively back onto box

name: Forward Small Hop to Lateral Box Jump
step_by_step: Perform small forward hop then explode laterally onto box

name: Lateral Box Jump
step_by_step: Jump laterally onto box from ground

name: Split-Squat Stance to Box Jump
step_by_step: Start in split squat stance and explode vertically onto box
coaching_cues: Explode off front leg, controlled landing

name: Heavy Barbell Split Squat
step_by_step: Load barbell and perform heavy split squats with controlled descent and strong drive up
coaching_cues: Front leg dominant, knee tracks over toes, chest tall

name: Heavy Dumbbell Step-Up
step_by_step: Perform heavy step-ups driving through full foot on box
coaching_cues: Explode through lead leg, control descent

name: Barbell Lateral Lunge
step_by_step: Step laterally under barbell and sit into hip before driving back to center
coaching_cues: Hips back, chest tall, strong push through foot

name: Goblet Cossack Squat
step_by_step: Hold dumbbell at chest and perform controlled side-to-side Cossack squats
coaching_cues: Sit deep into hip, keep heel down

name: Lateral Sled Drag
step_by_step: Attach sled and perform lateral drag steps maintaining low athletic posture
coaching_cues: Drive through inside edge, stay low and powerful

name: Isometric Face Pull
step_by_step: Pull rope to face and hold isometrically
coaching_cues: Elbows high, squeeze shoulder blades down and back

name: TRX Explosive Bulgarian Split Squat
step_by_step: Rear foot suspended in TRX; descend and explosively drive upward
coaching_cues: Quick transition at bottom, drive through front leg
